column3: Total No. of Cases ForInvestigation Including Pending Cases from previous year
column5: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Refused
column6: No. of Cases in which Investigation was completed - Charge Found False / Mistake of Fact or Law Etc.
column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation was completed - Final Report True Submitted
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation was completed - Charge Sheets Were Submitted
column9: No. of Cases in which Investigation was completed - Total {(Col.6) + (Col.7) + (Co.8)}
column10: No. of Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year
column12: Percentage of Pendency to All India Total
